part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= stands sentinel in the salt-blanketed dunes, wrapped in tattered strips. =pronouns.Possessive= weathered form, veiled in crimson patterns, echoes with the wisdom of ages past, their moisture long since given to the wind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= is a dark and foreboding creature, with scales the color of weathered basalt and eyes that gleam like molten lava. =pronouns.Possessive= mane is a tangle of dark, writhing tendrils that seem to stretch endlessly beneath the water's surface. =pronouns.Subjective= is known for =pronouns.possessive= fierce and territorial nature, guarding Yonth with a sense of ancient, primal power.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A grotesque creature that emerges from the briny waters of the marsh, =pronouns.subjective= is a twisted and decayed form of a once-living being. =pronouns.Possessive= flesh is marred by the corrosive effects of the saline environment. =pronouns.Possessive= pallid skin is mottled with patches of algae and barnacles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: 'Never die in the swamp while carrying cloning draught.' -Old Joppan Proverb
